In this package we are implementing a package which is for Lab 7.


```{r}
library(caret)
library(mlbench)

data("BostonHousing")
trainIndex <- createDataPartition(BostonHousing$lstat, p = .7, 
                                  list = FALSE, 
                                  times = 1)

train <- BostonHousing[ trainIndex,]
test  <- BostonHousing[-trainIndex,]

train(lstat ~., data = train,
               method='leapForward')

summary(train(lstat ~., data = train,
               method='leapForward'))
```
